title: Candle Girl
description: This story is inspired by a girl who has a heart like a candle. She has fortitude in her life, is responsive to the people around her, but sometimes she sacrifices herself for the benefit of others. Romantic story of her romance with naive man tinged with the reality of life background such as: religion, family, culture, and the past love story that she experienced. This is the interesting story.
author: Rudi Hilmanto
